name: Space Elves
description:
DESCRIPTION

Jump into the Kite and take part in the crew of Captain Aurkee. Take control of the ship and shoot your way through an asteroid storm.

CONTROLS

GamepadKeyboardMovementLeft analog stick
D-padArrowsShootXXOther actionsA, B, YA, B, YPauseStartP

TIP

The bigger the asteroid, the more fuel it gives, so shoot those first.

CHEATS

If you think the game is too easy for you, try tiping "gorka" in the main menu to unlock the hard mode.

CREDITS

  • A game by Basakume
  • Music and sound effects from YouTube library
    • Menu song: Aurora Currents (Asher Fulero)
    • In-game song: Dream of A Day (Density & Time)
    • Sound effects:
      • Laser Gun
      • Thunder Crack
      • Wood Hit Metal Crash
  • Made with Construct 2
  • Special thanks to beta testers
    • Daniel
    • Gorka
    • Hernán
    • Mikel
